author: Bill Birtch
content:
I like your vision of bicycles as toons. Never thought of that before but I see where you're coming from.
Sorry to disappoint but I won't be seeing Leonard Cohen when he's here later this month. I might have but Neil Young is here on April 15 and considering the cost of concert tickets, just shy of $400 for two, well, it really was a no brainer.

Also, the Cohen concert in London, the other one, was aired on tv last night so I had a front row seat and the price was right.
